name: Country Pop
description: Combination of Country with Pop to appeal to a larger audience.

children.name: Bro-Country
children.description: 21st century style with an often party-oriented sound and lyrical content, taking strong influence from Hard Rock, Hip Hop and Pop.

children.name: Countrypolitan
children.description: Emphasizes Pop-oriented orchestration and songwriting while reducing the role of Country instrumentation and rhythms; often featuring lush string arrangements and group backing vocals.
